com.github.robtimus.io.stream

Class RandomReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • com.github.robtimus.io.stream.RandomReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable

    public final class RandomReader
extends Reader
    A reader that will return random characters. This reader supports mark(int) and reset(). It comes with a default mark at the start of the stream, which means that reset() can be called at any time.
    Author:
    Rob Spoor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RandomReader.Builder
      A builder for random readers.

      • usingAllCharacters

        public static RandomReader.Builder usingAllCharacters()
        Returns a builder for random readers that can return all possible characters.
        Returns:
        A builder for random readers that can return all possible characters.

      • usingRange

        public static RandomReader.Builder usingRange(char start,
                                              char end)
        Returns a builder for random readers that can return characters from a specific range.
        Parameters:
        start - The start of the range, inclusive.
        end - The end of the range, inclusive.
        Returns:
        A builder for random readers that can return characters from the given range.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If start is larger than end.

      • usingAlphabet

        public static RandomReader.Builder usingAlphabet(String alphabet)
        Returns a builder for random readers that can return characters from a specific alphabet.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - A string representing the alphabet to use.
        Returns:
        A builder for random readers that can return characters from the given alphabet.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given alphabet is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given alphabet is empty.

      • usingHex

        public static RandomReader.Builder usingHex()
        Returns a builder for random readers that can return characters from 0-9 and a-z.
        Returns:
        A builder for random readers that can return characters from 0-9 and a-z.

      • usingHex

        public static RandomReader.Builder usingHex(boolean upperCase)
        Returns a builder for random readers that can return characters from 0-9 and a-z or A-Z.
        Parameters:
        upperCase - true to use A-Z, or false to use a-z.
        Returns:
        A builder for random readers that can return characters from 0-9 and a-z or A-Z.

      • usingDigits

        public static RandomReader.Builder usingDigits()
        Returns a builder for random readers that can return digits.
        Returns:
        A builder for random readers that can return digits.

      • usingGenerator

        public static RandomReader.Builder usingGenerator(ToIntFunction<Random> generator)
        Returns a builder for random readers that uses a custom generator for characters. For each generated value, only the 16 low-order bits are used; the 16 high-order bits are ignored.
        Parameters:
        generator - The generator to use.
        Returns:
        A builder for random readers that uses the given custom generator.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given custom generator is null.
